meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>outside</kanji> <kanji>country</kanji> is one outside of your own country. That is a <vocabulary>foreign country</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>other countries</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>overseas</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
